name: Platformer Under Construction
description:
You, as a Jumping fella, arrive in a platformer facility to do some platforming through some neat platforms, just to find out  that they still have only one room available. To satisfy your platforming itch in such an alarming situation, both your jumping and level engineering skills will be put to the test.

Use the arrow keys to move and space to jump. Escape closes the game.

This is my first game in sfml and the first game I made without an engine.
